title: BusinessWeek logo
content:
First post for me, so I'm just gonna state that after stalking these forums for a couple weeks it feels really good that I can finally post something. Anywho, down to business.

**Does anyone know the font for the Business Week Logo?** I think it's something like Lucida Bright, but the S's are slightly different. This seems like such a basic font I feel like bit silly for not being able to figure it out myself.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [bw\_255x65.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20120430000101/http:/typophile.com/files/bw_255x65.gif) | 9.44 KB |
author: sillywalk

comments.content:
Those mastheads are often custom designed.  
(BTW. It’s not Lucida Bright at all.)
For a similar font look at [Century 725 Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20120430000101/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/century-725/condensed/)
